articles.author: Son Dakika
articles.title: Titanik'e Dalış Yaparken Kaybolan Denizaltının 40 Saatlik Oksijeni Kaldı - Son Dakika
articles.description: A small submarine that disappeared in the Atlantic Ocean last Sunday while diving to the Titanic wreck has 40 hours of oxygen left, according to a statement by the US Coast Guard. The statement also mentioned that search and rescue operations are ongoing in an area of 7,600 square miles, which is larger than the state of Connecticut. The submarine was carrying five people, including British billionaire and explorer Hamish Harding and French explorer Paul-Henry Nargeolet. The US and Canada are conducting joint search and rescue operations. The Titanic wreck is located 3,800 meters deep in the Atlantic Ocean, about 600 kilometers off the coast of Newfoundland, Canada.

articles.author: Son Dakika
articles.title: Kılıçdaroğlu, asgari ücret zammını eleştirdi, Türk-İş Başkanı Ergün Atalay cevap verdi - Son Dakika
articles.description: This article discusses the recent decision by the Asgari Ücret Tespit Komisyonu to raise the minimum wage by 34% to 11,402 lira. The leader of the CHP, Kemal Kılıçdaroğlu, criticized the decision and accused the head of the Turkish labor union of selling out to the government. The head of the union, Ergün Atalay, responded by defending the decision and criticizing Kılıçdaroğlu's understanding of the political system.

articles.author: Son Dakika
articles.title: Fenerbahçe Başkanı Ali Koç, Taraftarın Arda Güler İçin Sadece 'Arda' Demesine Tepki Gösterdi - Son Dakika
articles.description: This article is about the introduction of Fenerbahçe's new season jerseys. During the presentation, a young fan called the young star Arda Güler by his first name, which angered Fenerbahçe President Ali Koç. The President and the young star played basketball during the presentation, and an interesting dialogue occurred between a young fan and Ali Koç.

articles.author: Hürriyet
articles.title: ABD Başkanı Biden’ın oğlu hakkındaki vergi suçlarını kabul etti - Hürriyet
articles.description: Hunter Biden, the son of US President Joe Biden, has pleaded guilty to two charges of willfully failing to pay income taxes and has reached an agreement with the court regarding an illegal weapons possession charge. The decision is expected to result in the elimination of Hunter's prison sentence and the granting of probation after approval by a federal judge. Donald Trump criticized the decision on social media, while the White House spokesperson expressed support for Hunter Biden's efforts to rebuild his life.

articles.author: BloombergHT
articles.title: ABD'li yatırım fonundan PayPal hamlesi - BloombergHT
articles.description: This article reports that Kohlberg Kravis Roberts (KKR), a US-based investment fund, has agreed to purchase PayPal's "buy now, pay later" (BNPL) credit portfolio in France, Germany, Italy, Spain, and the UK for up to €40 billion in Europe. The sale is expected to be completed in the second half of this year, and PayPal plans to allocate an additional $1 billion to share buybacks in 2023 once the sale is completed. PayPal launched its BNPL service in 2020 and has provided more than 200 million credits to over 30 million customers globally.

articles.author: Milliyet
articles.title: MasterChef Celal kimdir? 2023 MasterChef All Star Celal Sarıgül kaç yaşında, nereli? - Milliyet

articles.author: Sözcü
articles.title: Derin dondurucuda dört ceset bulunmuştu: Kan donduran cinayetin nedeni ortaya çıktı - Sözcü
articles.description: The suspect in the intentional murder of four Turkmenistan citizens, three women and one man, in Bayraklı district has been caught by the police in Çeşme district. The suspect, who was caught with the knife used in the murder, confessed that he committed the murders due to jealousy. The suspect's accomplices were also caught and taken into custody. The suspect admitted to killing the victims one by one with sharp tools and then dismembering them before putting them in the freezer and refrigerator. The victims were identified as a mother and her two daughters who came to Turkey in 2019 and a man who was the boyfriend of one of the daughters.

articles.author: Milliyet
articles.title: ABD Dışişleri Bakanı Blinken: 'Xi ve Biden önümüzdeki aylarda görüşebilir' - Milliyet
articles.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken has expressed hope that his meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing will bring stability to bilateral relations. Blinken said that President Biden strongly believes in managing relations between China and the US responsibly. The meeting aimed to re-establish communication channels at the highest levels of government and to discuss the real differences between the two countries. Blinken also discussed Taiwan and exchanged views on Russia's aggression towards Ukraine and China's potential positive role in this regard. He expressed hope for more high-level contacts between China and the US in the coming months.

articles.author: Mynet
articles.title: Saç dökülmesini durduran en etkili yöntem! Yeni saçların çıkması için şampuanınıza ekleyin - Mynet
articles.description: Using natural methods for hair care can be more effective in preventing hair loss and promoting new hair growth than expensive hair care products. Creating a hair washing routine and being mindful of the products used can make a noticeable difference in hair loss. Massaging the scalp during hair washing can improve blood circulation and contribute to new hair growth. Avoiding heat and chemical treatments while drying and styling hair can prevent hair loss and damage. Adding 25 drops of pine turpentine oil to a bottle of shampoo can nourish hair roots, prevent hair loss, and accelerate new hair growth.

articles.author: Vatan
articles.title: Akrilik Boya Nasıl Kullanılır? Akrilik Boya Kullanırken Yapılması Gerekenler... - Vatan
articles.description: This article discusses the use of acrylic paints to create realistic and three-dimensional images in art. Tips for using acrylic paints include diluting them with water, using a palette with glass or plastic, and using a gel to reduce drying time. Acrylic paints are versatile and can be used on various surfaces such as metal, canvas, and ceramics.

articles.author: BBC Türkçe
articles.title: Suriye gazetesi El Vatan: Rusya Astana’da Türkiye’nin Suriye’den çekilmesi için takvim sunacak - BBC Türkçe
articles.description: This article discusses the upcoming Astana talks between Russia, Turkey, and Syria, with the Syrian newspaper El Vatan reporting that Russia will present a timetable for Turkey's withdrawal from Syria. The article notes that Turkey and its supported armed groups control a large area in northern Syria, while Syria sees this as an occupation and demands its end for negotiations to progress. The article also highlights the differences in the two countries' positions and the potential impact of recent clashes between the Syrian army and Turkish-backed YPG forces on the talks.

articles.author: Tgrthaber
articles.title: Son dakika! Beştepe'de asgari ücret buluşması! Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan, Bakan Işıkhan ve temsilcileri kabul etti - Tgrthaber
articles.description: President Recep Tayyip Erdogan met with the Minister of Labor Vedat Isikhan, the President of TISK Ozgur Burak Akkol, and the President of Turk-Is Ergun Atalay at the Presidential Palace after the announcement of the new minimum wage increase. The meeting was closed to the press. Akkol presented Erdogan with a gift that included flags representing the 16 Turkish states established throughout history. Erdogan announced on social media that the new minimum wage will be 11,402 TL net starting from July. The Minister of Labor and Social Security, Vedat Işıkhan, announced that the minimum wage increase for the rest of the year is 34%, bringing the net wage to 11,402 TL. The total cost to the employer for the new minimum wage is 15,762.04 TL per month.

articles.author: Milliyet
articles.title: MSB: Suriye'den Türkiye'ye geçmeye çalışan 1'i PKK mensubu, 2 kişi yakalandı - Milliyet
articles.description: Two individuals attempting to illegally cross into Turkey from Syria were caught by border units, and one of them was identified as a member of the PKK/YPG terrorist organization, according to a statement from the Ministry on their Twitter account.

articles.author: TELE1 TV
articles.title: ‘Deli Yürek’ geri dönüyor! - TELE1 TV
articles.description: The popular Turkish TV series "Deli Yürek" is returning with a new version, produced by Calinos Entertainment in partnership with Sinegraf. The original series, directed by Osman Sınav and starring Kenan İmirzalıoğlu, aired from 1998 to 2002. The new version will feature a new cast and storyline.

articles.author: Eurohoops Turk
articles.title: Ergin Ataman: “Atina’ya Tatile Değil, Kazanmaya Geldim” - Eurohoops Turk
articles.description: Panathinaikos, Ergin Ataman'la 2 yıllık sözleşme imzaladı. Ataman, Yunan basınına yaptığı açıklamada, Panathinaikos'un yeni başantrenörü olarak çok mutlu olduğunu ve kulüp olarak büyük hedefler için mücadele etmeye hazır olduklarını söyledi. Ataman, güçlü, geniş ve kaliteli bir kadroları olacağını ve taraftarların desteğinin kendilerine güç vereceğini belirtti.
